TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintQueueStatus extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the status of a print queue or its printer.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Like the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class, this enumeration handles the print queue and the physical printer (or device) as one unit. Some values represent the status of the physical device and others represent the status of the print queue program that is running on the print server.
Use this enumeration to provide values for the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.QueueStatus%2A> property of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> class.
## Examples The following example shows how to use this enumeration as part of a survey all printers for possible error status.
[!code-cpp[PrinterStatusSurvey#SpotTroubleUsingQueueAttributes](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/printerstatussurvey/Program.cpp#spottroubleusingqueueattributes)] [!code-vb[PrinterStatusSurvey#SpotTroubleUsingQueueAttributes](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/printerstatussurvey/program.vb#spottroubleusingqueueattributes)] [!code-cs[PrinterStatusSurvey#SpotTroubleUsingQueueAttributes](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/PrinterStatusSurvey/Program.cs#spottroubleusingqueueattributes)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Busy = int32(512)

Docs.summary: The printer is busy.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus DoorOpen = int32(4194304)

Docs.summary: A door on the printer is open.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Error = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The printer cannot print due to an error condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Initializing = int32(32768)

Docs.summary: The printer is initializing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus IOActive = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The printer is exchanging data with the print server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus ManualFeed = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The printer is waiting for a user to place print media in the manual feed bin.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Status is not specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus NotAvailable = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: Status information is unavailable.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus NoToner = int32(262144)

Docs.summary: The printer is out of toner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Offline = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The printer is offline.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus OutOfMemory = int32(2097152)

Docs.summary: The printer has no available memory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus OutputBinFull = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: The printer's output bin is full.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus PagePunt = int32(524288)

Docs.summary: The printer is unable to print the current page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus PaperJam = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The paper in the printer is jammed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus PaperOut = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The printer does not have, or is out of, the type of paper needed for the current print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus PaperProblem = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The paper in the printer is causing an unspecified error condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Paused = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The print queue is paused.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus PendingDeletion = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The print queue is deleting a print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus PowerSave = int32(16777216)

Docs.summary: The printer is in power save mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Printing = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: The device is printing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Processing = int32(16384)

Docs.summary: The device is doing some kind of work, which need not be printing if the device is a combination printer, fax machine, and scanner.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus ServerUnknown = int32(8388608)

Docs.summary: The printer is in an error state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus TonerLow = int32(131072)

Docs.summary: Only a small amount of toner remains in the printer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus UserIntervention = int32(1048576)

Docs.summary: The printer requires user action to correct an error condition.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus Waiting = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: The printer is waiting for a print job.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintQueueStatus WarmingUp = int32(65536)

Docs.summary: The printer is warming up.
